basic.description: First order differential equations, linear differential equations with constant coefficients. Laplace transforms. Systems of linear differential equations. Introduction to numerical methods for ODEs. Examples involving the use of differential equations in solving circuits will be presented.
basic.subject: MTHE
basic.title: Diff Equations For Elec & Comp

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: APSC 171, APSC 172, APSC 174 and registered in BSCE.
